original_title: Colombo East best hospital for COVID 19 diagnosis
original_body_lines: The staff of the Colombo East Base Hospital (CEBS) which has been selected as the best hospital for the diagnosis of COVID 19 was felicitated yesterday at a ceremony held in the hospital. The Director of the Hospital Dr. Priyantha Karunaratna and Doctor-in-Charge of the laboratory Dr. Thusharah Thanthirige were present at the ceremony. Pix by Pradeep Dilruskshana
